      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsVertex(long vertexId)
      Convenience method which is identical to calling containsVertex on the ISubgraphTemplate returned from ISubgraph.getTemplate().
      PropertySet getEdgeProperties()
      Returns the set of edge properties associated with this graph.
      long getId()
      Returns the id of subgraph.

      Returns an Iterable over all instances in this subgraph.

      Returns an Iterable over all instances in this subgraph.
      long getPartitionForRemoteVertex(long id)
      Retrieves the partition id of the partition that owns the specified remote vertex.
      Map<Long,Long> getRemoteVertexMappings()
      Returns a mapping of all remote vertices in this subgraph to the partition that owns them.
      ISubgraphTemplate getTemplate()
      Returns the subgraph template which contains the structure of this subgraph.
      TemplateVertex getVertex(long vertexId)
      Convenience method which is identical to calling getVertex() on the ISubgraphTemplate returned from ISubgraph.getTemplate().
      PropertySet getVertexProperties()
      Returns the set of vertex properties associated with this graph.
      boolean isDirected()
      Returns if the graph is directed.
      boolean isRemoteVertex(long id)
      Tests if a vertex in this subgraph is actually owned by another partition.

      • getInstances

        public Iterable<? extends ISubgraphInstance> getInstances()
                                                   throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ISubgraph
        Returns an Iterable over all instances in this subgraph. Each ISubgraphInstance is expected to be loaded on demand.

      • getInstances

        public abstract Iterable<? extends ISubgraphInstance> getInstances(long startTime,
                                                 long endTime,
                                                 PropertySet vertexProperties,
                                                 PropertySet edgeProperties)
                                                            throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ISubgraph
        Returns an Iterable over all instances in this subgraph. Each ISubgraphInstance is expected to be loaded on demand. Instances will be evaluated and returned based on the given time range [startTime, endTime) and will return only the specified properties.
        Specified by:
        getInstances in interface ISubgraph
        Parameters:
        startTime - the beginning of the instance time range, inclusive
        endTime - the end of the instance time range, exclusive
        vertexProperties - the properties to retrieve for vertices
        edgeProperties - the properties to retrieve for edges
        Returns:
        An Iterable which will return instances matching the query, loaded on demand
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isRemoteVertex

        public boolean isRemoteVertex(long id)
        Description copied from interface: ISubgraph
        Tests if a vertex in this subgraph is actually owned by another partition. The result of this method is only defined if this subgraph contains a vertex with the given id.
        Specified by:
        isRemoteVertex in interface ISubgraph
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the vertex
        Returns:
        true if the vertex is owned by another partition, false otherwise

      • getPartitionForRemoteVertex

        public long getPartitionForRemoteVertex(long id)
        Description copied from interface: ISubgraph
        Retrieves the partition id of the partition that owns the specified remote vertex. The result of this method is only defined if ISubgraph.isRemoteVertex(long) would return true for this vertex id.
        Specified by:
        getPartitionForRemoteVertex in interface ISubgraph
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the vertex
        Returns:
        the partition id of the partition that owns this vertex

      • getRemoteVertexMappings

        public Map<Long,Long> getRemoteVertexMappings()
        Description copied from interface: ISubgraph
        Returns a mapping of all remote vertices in this subgraph to the partition that owns them. The collection returned is read-only.
        Specified by:
        getRemoteVertexMappings in interface ISubgraph
        Returns:
        a map remote vertices to partition ids
